sn43.12:1.9: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitam vo maya asankhatam, desito asankhatagamimaggo.
sn43.12:1.10: Yam, bhikkhave, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya, katam vo tam maya.
sn43.12:1.11: Etani, bhikkhave, rukkhamulani, etani sunnagarani. Jhayatha, bhikkhave, ma pamadattha; ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasaniti.
sn43.12:2.1: Asankhatanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami asankhatagaminca maggam.
sn43.12:2.9: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitam vo maya asankhatam …pe…
sn43.12:3.8: Avitakko avicaro samadhi. Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asankhatagamimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:4.8: Appanihito samadhi. Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asankhatagamimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn43.12:5.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanasu vedananupassi viharati …pe…
sn43.12:5.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu citte cittanupassi viharati …pe…
sn43.12:5.11: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati …pe… ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asankhatagamimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn43.12:6.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn43.12:6.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannanam kusalanam dhammanam uppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
sn43.12:6.11: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati. Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asankhatagamimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti.
sn43.12:7.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viriyasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti.
sn43.12:7.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cittasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti.
sn43.12:7.11: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vimamsasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti. Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asankhatagamimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhindriyam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn43.12:8.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viriyindriyam bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe…
sn43.12:8.14: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pannindriyam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim. Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asankhatagamimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhabalam bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe…
sn43.12:9.14: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pannabalam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim. Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asankhatagamimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe…
sn43.12:10.10: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim. Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, asankhatagamimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn43.12:11.11: asankhatanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami asankhatagaminca maggam.
sn43.12:11.15: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn43.12:11.17: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitam vo maya asankhatam, desito asankhatagamimaggo.
sn43.12:11.18: Yam, bhikkhave, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya, katam vo tam maya.
sn43.12:11.19: Etani, bhikkhave, rukkhamulani, etani sunnagarani. Jhayatha, bhikkhave, ma pamadattha; ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasani”ti.
